page.title: 16RECREATION IN MELROSE
page.content: In{Melrose}there are many recreational facilities avaliable. These include tennis courts,a bowling green,rugby ground,golf course and a{riding centre We recorded an interview with the owner of{Ellwyn Glen Riding Centre: "How many horses have you?" {"I have 12 horses." "How many ponies do you have?" {"I have 13 ponies." "What is the oldest horse?" {"George,aged 34 is the oldest." "What is the smallest pony?" {"Tato,a Shetland pony,is 9 hands high. "How long have you had the stables?" {"I have had the stables for 10 years." "How many take lessons each week?" {"I have 20 to 25 each week." "How many take lessons at weekends?" {"I have 30 to 40 each Saturday and {Sunday." }
